title: Do the majority of questions in VITEEE come from 12th course or 11th? - Quora
tags: Vellore Institute of Technology, Vellore Exams and Tests
Vellore Institute of Technology Engineering Entrance Examination (VITEEE)

response.answer_text: VITEEE is more of a speed test just like the BITSAT examination. The level of VITEEE is equivalent to BITSAT examination and most of the paper consists of 12th topics. Around 65-70 percentof the questions asked are from class 12th syllabus. Being a Physics teacher I can guide you for Physics preparation. Important Physics topics from 11th include work, power and energy, momentum conservation, friction, rotational dynamics, waves and KTG. Complete 12th is important for this exam along with chapters like Semiconductors, logic gates and communication systems. The best thing to do right now would be to buy past year question papers of a trusted publisher. Give as many as online tests as you can right now. Buy a test series for the same. If you start now, a good score may be be easily scored with proper practice and analysis of tests. Good Luck.

Hey good Question i appreciate it . So talking about the Syllabus For VITEEE Exam. In order to crack the VITEEE Exam you have to more focus on 12th CBSE syllabus as VITEEE Exam Contain round about 92% of the Syllabus of 12th CBSE Class. And the Subjects that you need to Focus on are as follow : PhysicsChemistryMathematicsBiologyEnglishTo Check Complete Syllabus for VITEEE Exam - Click Here
When I gave d entrance xam. Majority were from 12th class only. But check ur prospectus for syllabus for being on the safe side & then prepare. All d best.
Most of the questions will be from 12th syllabus.
Most of the questions come from the 12th syllabus. However a lot of 12th standard chapters have basics in 11th too.
